page.shortlink: tabbed ui properties session timeout warning target page after session timeout property
page.description: Defines the target page to redirect the user to after the session times out.

discussion.p: If the *[ui:After session timeout action]* has been set to 'Redirect To Another Page', you can define the target page after session timeout. The target page can be another page or the Tabbed UI. To redirect to the UX Component, set *[ui:Target page after session timeout]* to the following:
